description.value:
The magic of your patron ensures you always have certain spells ready; when you reach a Warlock level specified in the Celestial Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

Celestial Spells
Warlock LevelSpells
3@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplCureWounds]{Cure Wounds}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplFlamingSph]{Flaming Sphere}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplGuidance00]{Guidance}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplGuidingBol]{Guiding Bolt}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplLesserRest]{Lesser Restoration}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplThaumaturg]{Thaumaturgy}
5@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDaylight00]{Daylight}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplRevivify00]{Revivify}
7@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplGuardianFa]{Guardian of Faith}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplWallOfFire]{Wall of Fire}
9@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplFlameStrik]{Flame Strike}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplGreaterRes]{Greater Restoration}
